shapes3d
Class Mesh2DCore

java.lang.Object
  shapes3d.Shape3D
      shapes3d.Mesh2DCore
All Implemented Interfaces:
processing.core.PConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
BezShape, Ellipsoid, Mesh2DCoreWithCaps, Toroid
public abstract class Mesh2DCore
extends Shape3D

Support class providing draw and texture methods for those shapes using a grid mesh.
ie BezierShape, Ellipsoid, Helix, Toroid and Tube.

Author:
Peter Lager

Method Detail

getDrawSection

public MeshSection getDrawSection()
Returns a MeshSection object (initially set for full shape) which can be modified and then added as a drawing section.

Returns:
a full MeshSection object for modification

addDrawSection

public void addDrawSection(MeshSection section)
Add a drawing section to the list of sections to draw. This cancels full shape drawing!

Parameters:
section -

removeDrawSection

public void removeDrawSection(MeshSection section)
Remove a draw section from the list, if it is the last one then switch to full shape draw.

Parameters:
section -

setDrawFullShape

public void setDrawFullShape()
Remove all draw sections and go back to full shape drawing.

setTexture

public void setTexture(java.lang.String fname)
Set the texture to be used for this Shape (no tiling)
If the image is loaded successfully then the drawMode is changed to TEXTURE.

Overrides:
setTexture in class Shape3D
Parameters:
fname -

setTexture

public void setTexture(processing.core.PImage img)
Set the image to be used for this Shape (no tiling)

Parameters:
img - if not null then the drawMode is changed to TEXTURE.

setTexture

public void setTexture(java.lang.String fname,
                       int ewRepeats,
                       int nsRepeats)
Set the texture to be used for this Shape and the number of texture repeats (tiling)
If the image is loaded successfully then the drawMode is changed to TEXTURE. 

                          nRptEW              nPrtNS 
 BezierShape              around Y axis       length
 Tube                     circumference       length
 Ellipsoid                east-west           north-south
 Helix                    along length        round tube
 Toroid                   along length        round tube

Overrides:
setTexture in class Shape3D
Parameters:
fname -
ewRepeats -
nsRepeats -

setTexture

public void setTexture(processing.core.PImage img,
                       int ewRepeats,
                       int nsRepeats)
Set the image to be used for this Shape and the number of texture repeats (tiling) 

                          nRptEW              nPrtNS 
 BezierShape              around Y axis       length
 Tube                     circumference       length
 Ellipsoid                east-west           north-south
 Helix                    along length        round tube
 Toroid                   along length        round tube

Parameters:
img - if not null then the drawMode is changed to TEXTURE.
ewRepeats -
nsRepeats -
